Text: The Vision Fund is the biggest tech investor in the world. It has $100 billion to spend from backers including Apple, Qualcomm, and controversially Saudia Arabia's sovereign wealth fund the PIF.
Cause: The Vision Fund is the biggest tech investor in the world.
Effect: It has $100 billion to spend from backers including Apple, Qualcomm, and controversially Saudia Arabia's sovereign wealth fund the PIF.
